translation: The drums and trumpets were sounded and the armies attacked each other.
The enraged warriors marched against the demons.

gurmukhi: sBnI qury ncwey; brCy pkiV kY ]
translation: All of them holding their daggers, caused their horses to dance.

gurmukhi: bhuqy mwr igrwey; AMdr Kyq dY ]
transliteration: Bahoute Maar Giraae Andar Khet Dai||
translation: Many were killed and thrown in the battlefield.
The arrows shot by the goddess came in showers.31.
The drums and conches were sounded and the war began.

gurmukhi: qix qix qIr clwey; durgw DnK lY ]
transliteration: Tan(i) Ran(i) Teer Chadhaae Durgad Dhanakh Lai||
translation: Durga, taking her bow, stretched it again and again for shooting arrows.

gurmukhi: ijnI dsq auTwey; rhy n jIvdy ]
translation: Those who raised their hands against the goddess, did not survive.

gurmukhi: cMf Aru mMuf Kpwey; dono dyvqw ]32]
transliteration: Channd Ar Mounnd Khapaae Dono Devataa||32||
translation: She destroyed both Chand and Mund.32.

gurmukhi: sMuiB insMuB irswey; mwry dYq sux ]
transliteration: Sounbh Nisounbh Risaae Mdare Dait Soun||
translation: Sumbh and Nisumbh were highly enraged on hearing this killing.
They called all the brave fighters, who were their advisers.
Those who had caused the gods like Indra run away.

gurmukhi: qyeI mwr igrwey; pl ivc dyvqw ]
translation: The goddess killed them in an instant.
